description.title: Retail Sales Index explorable datasets
description.summary: A first estimate of retail sales in volume and value terms, seasonally and non-seasonally adjusted. Internet sales statistics and measure the value of Internet Sales of British retailers on a monthly basis.
description.metaDescription: A first estimate of retail sales in volume and value terms, seasonally and non-seasonally adjusted. Internet sales statistics and measure the value of Internet Sales of British retailers on a monthly basis.
